questions.question: What is an inventory book used for?
What is the purpose of a physical inventory count?
options: A) To determine the cost of goods sold
B) To verify the accuracy of inventory records

questions.question: What is a bank statement?
options: A) A document showing all bank transactions over a period
B) A summary of credit sales
C) A record of cash purchases

questions.question: What is bank reconciliation?
options: A) Comparing cash receipts with sales records
B) Matching bank statement transactions with the company's records
